alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 12:50AM CDT until May 13 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hidalgo County in Deep South Texas... Eastern Starr County in Deep South Texas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1249 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Starr County Memorial Hospital to near Los Ebanos to 16 miles southwest of Granjero, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Mission, Pharr, Weslaco, San Juan, Alamo, Donna, Rio Grande City, Hidalgo and Progreso. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
